document_data.caption: A map showing Elsambul's Lane in the Castle Ward.
document_data.name: Elsambul's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Elsambul's Lane''' was a back alley located in [[Waterdeep]], City of Splendors, during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Castle Ward}}
document_data.Location: Elsambul's Lane was located in the north section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The alley ran north to south in between the [[Street of the Sword]] to the east and [[Warrior's Way]] to the west. It was intersected by [[Lamp Street]] in its northern half and by [[Cymbril's Walk]] in its southern half.
